title: Society :: Looking for team members :: DiamondV+
body:
Hey, I'm looking to create a high tier serious team looking to qualify for OCS and OPL. I, Hoodlum, will be the starting support for this team and considering to be the substitute in the future. I am certainly able to promise that this team will have talent, cooperation, teamwork and the high skill of individual mechanics. 
The available positions are:
**- Top
- Jungle
- Mid
- ADC
- Coach / Analyst**

The requirements are as followed:
**- DiamondV+ soloqueue rank
- 17 years old
- A non-toxic and well matured attitude
- Able to accept constructive criticism
- A high champ pool in respected lane
-  Professionalism and serious attitude**

To apply, please add me in-game, or contact me at: tommy.van@hilarious.com (better and safer option)
> I will be handpicking the members based on tryouts, champ history and soloqueue performance.

I'll be glad to working with you in the future.
